subject: Marketing
title: Unbundling for Transparency
description: A quick, practical guide to Unbundling for Transparency.

hook.text: Airlines unbundled seat selection, bags, and meals. Revenue per passenger soared 20%.

buildup.text: Unbundling lets price-sensitive customers pay less while others pay for what they value.

discovery.text: It creates an illusion of fairnessâ€”you only pay for what you choose.

twist.text: Most passengers end up paying more total than the old all-inclusive fare.

climax.text: Unbundling shifts the anchoring from total cost to each small add-on decision.

punchline.text: Small choices add up faster than big prices.

quiz.question: How does unbundling affect total customer spending?
options: Most customers end up paying more through small add-on purchases
It always reduces total spending per customer
Spending stays exactly the same as bundled pricing
